entries.journal_entry_description: A Varactyl is a powerful and dangerous creature. In the right circumstance they are also an extremely loyal pet. The trick is to make sure you are the first things that they see when they hatch. This means gathering up a varactyl egg and waiting for it to hatch. There is a nest in the region that eggs can be gathered from but there is a catch. The nest belongs to Jagged Fang, the matriarch of the varactyl in the region. Jagged Fang gaurds the nest jealously and will have to be destroyed in order to get anywhere near the nest.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: In order to get any eggs out of the nest you are going to have to kill Jagged Fang. This extremely large varactyl guards the nest jealously and will attack anyone who gets close.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Now that Jagged Fang is no longer keeping you away from the nest, pick out an egg.
